protein.specific_function: Plays a fundamental role in microtubule-organizing center structure and function. Required for centriole duplication and correct spindle formation. Has a role in regulating cytokinesis and genome stability via cooperation with CALM1 and CEP110

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides

reference.reference_text: Lee VD, Huang B: Molecular cloning and centrosomal localization of human caltractin. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1993 Dec 1;90(23):11039-43.
